categories: Category:Battles of the Great Jedi Purge

nodes.text: A battle took place on the astronomical object Tellanroaeg by the final year of the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic's clone troopers and the forces of the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

When the clone trooper commander received an urgent message through a secure comlink which was frequency-locked to a channel reserved for the Commander-in-Chief of the Grand Army of the Republic, Supreme Chancellor Palpatine, the clone commander ordered his troops to kill their Jedi General.
